reference.shortdesc: The howtoavoid element contains information about how a user can avoid a hazard, for example, "Do not use solvents to clean the drum surface."

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The howtoavoid element is specialized from li. It is defined in the hazard-statement domain module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <hazardstatement type="notice"> <messagepanel> <typeofhazard>Machinery Damage</typeofhazard> <howtoavoid> <sl> <sli>Do NOT use solvents to clean the drum surface</sli> <sli>Read manual for proper drum cleaning procedure</sli> </sl> </howtoavoid> </messagepanel> <hazardsymbol href="readmanual.png"/> <hazardsymbol href="agressivesolvent.png"/> </hazardstatement>
